General.Name: Wanted Lab Inc.
General.Description: Wantedlab, Inc. operates a referral recruiting platform in South Korea. Its platform allows anyone to refer a candidate in their field of expertise and receive compensation if they get hired. The company also offers Gigs, a freelance matching service; and Wanted+, a regular subscription service for job-related education and lecture content; Common Space, a HR platform service for companies. It also operates in Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Singapore. Wantedlab, Inc. was founded in 2015 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Lotte World Tower, Seoul, South Korea
